summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Haergo HR System Phase 2 - Smart Attendance features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend testing successful with all new attendance pages functional including attendance tracking, history with statistics, and face registration. All core Phase 2 features implemented and working.
passed_tests: Backend API - Attendance Settings (office location coordinates correct: -6.161777, 106.875199)
Backend API - Today's Attendance (returns null when no attendance)
Backend API - Attendance History (returns empty array initially)
Backend API - Attendance Statistics (22 working days, correct calculation)
Backend API - Face Registration Check (returns registered status)
Backend API - Face Registration (128-dimensional descriptor accepted)
Backend API - Attendance Clock In (WFH mode, status: terlambat)
Frontend - Attendance Page loading with Clock In/Out buttons
Frontend - Today's Status Card showing current attendance (Clock In: 19:42, status: terlambat)
Frontend - Clock In button disabled (already clocked in)
Frontend - Clock Out button enabled (ready for clock out)
Frontend - Attendance History Page with statistics display
Frontend - Statistics cards showing: 22 working days, 0 present, 1 late, 0 absent, 4.5% attendance
Frontend - Attendance record table showing today's WFH clock in
Frontend - Face Registration Page loading successfully
Frontend - Face Registration status showing 'Wajah Terdaftar' (Face Registered)
Frontend - Face API models loading with progress indicator
Frontend - Sidebar navigation working for all attendance menu items
Frontend - Login integration working with admin credentials
Integration - User account linked to employee record for attendance features
